text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Tastes Very Special
text.summary: Beth, Sherry and two other friends discuss Kathy, who can't have children due to medical reasons, Bill, who works as a carpenter replacing a barn floor, and Carolyn, who reacted rudely to their friend Barb's illness, as well as their own preferences for drinking tea with or without lemon.
